root.p: To update shipping details, first login to ${siteName}. When you are logged - in, your profile settings will be displayed at the top right of the web page, with your username as it's title.
If your profile settings is collapsed, a + button will be displayed. If collapsed, expand your profile setting using the + button.
Under your profile settings click on the my orders link. This will enable you view both the orders you made for other sellers items and those made by other buyers for your items.
In the orders table under the actions column click on the update shipping link.
